docs: @notice Initializes the LUSDT token contract with security hardening
@dev Sets up RBAC, initializes security parameters
@param bridge_account The bridge service account (BRIDGE_ROLE)
@param tax_manager The tax manager contract address
@param emergency_admin Emergency admin (separate from owner)
constructors.label: new

docs: Security context
args.label: block_timestamp

docs: @title LUSDT Events
@notice All events follow CEI pattern and include security context
events.label: Transfer

docs: Security: Request ID for idempotency
args.label: request_id

docs: The operation that was being performed.
args.label: operation

docs: A message describing the alert.
args.label: message

docs: The timestamp of the alert.
args.label: timestamp

docs: @custom:event Emitted when a critical security-related event occurs.
events.label: SecurityAlert

docs: @notice Returns the contract version
messages.label: get_version

docs: @notice Modifies the code which is used to execute calls to this contract.
@dev Can only be called by the owner.
@custom:security Only owner can call this function
messages.label: set_code

docs: @notice Pauses the contract. Can only be called by the emergency admin.
messages.label: emergency_pause

docs: @notice Unpauses the contract. Can only be called by the owner.
messages.label: emergency_unpause

docs: @notice Returns pause status and details
messages.label: pause_status

docs: @notice Returns the contract owner
messages.label: get_owner

docs: @notice Returns if contract is paused
messages.label: is_paused

docs: @notice Returns bridge account
messages.label: get_bridge_account

docs: @notice Returns emergency admin
messages.label: get_emergency_admin

docs: @notice Mints new tokens with comprehensive security checks
@dev Implements: RBAC, Circuit Breaker, Rate Limiting, Safe Math, CEI Pattern
@param to The account that will receive the minted tokens
@param amount The amount of tokens to mint (in smallest unit)
messages.label: mint

docs: @notice Burns tokens with security hardening
@dev Implements: Circuit Breaker, Safe Math, CEI Pattern, Idempotency
messages.label: burn

docs: @notice Transfers tokens from the caller to a recipient.
@dev This is a standard PSP22 transfer function. It will fail if the contract is paused.
Uses checked arithmetic to prevent overflow/underflow.
@param to The account that will receive the tokens
@param value The amount of tokens to transfer (in smallest unit)
@return Ok(()) on success, Error on failure
@custom:security Validates sufficient balance before transfer
@custom:security Uses checked arithmetic for balance updates
messages.label: transfer

docs: @notice Approves a spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.
@dev Implements: Safe Math, CEI Pattern
messages.label: approve

docs: @notice Transfers tokens on behalf of the caller.
@dev Implements: Safe Math, CEI Pattern, Reentrancy Protection
messages.label: transfer_from

docs: @notice Returns the total supply of the token.
@dev This is a read-only function that works even when the contract is paused.
@return The total amount of tokens in circulation
messages.label: total_supply

docs: @notice Returns the balance of a given account.
@dev This is a read-only function that works even when the contract is paused.
@param who The account to query the balance of
@return The balance of the specified account (0 if account doesn't exist)
messages.label: balance_of

docs: @notice Returns the allowance of a spender for an owner.
@dev Implements: Safe Math
messages.label: allowance

docs: @notice Sets a new bridge account.
@dev Can only be called by the owner. The bridge account is the only
account authorized to mint new tokens.
@param new_bridge The account ID of the new bridge service
@return Ok(()) on success, Error::Unauthorized if caller is not owner
@custom:security Only owner can call this function
messages.label: set_bridge_account

docs: @notice Sets a new tax manager contract address.
@dev Can only be called by the owner. The tax manager handles all fee calculations.
@param new_tax_manager The account ID of the new tax manager contract
@return Ok(()) on success, Error::Unauthorized if caller is not owner
@custom:security Only owner can call this function
messages.label: set_tax_manager_contract

docs: @notice Returns the current tax manager contract address.
@dev The tax manager contract handles all fee calculations and distributions.
@return The AccountId of the current tax manager contract
messages.label: get_tax_manager_contract

docs: @notice Updates the bridge account address.
messages.label: update_bridge_account

docs: @notice Updates the emergency admin account address.
messages.label: update_emergency_admin

docs: @notice Updates the tax manager contract address.
messages.label: update_tax_manager
